html:
Hi Louis Barclay,

Thanks for updating your DNS records! We’ve verified your Return-Path domain and any emails sent from the sundaystori.es domain will use pm-bounces.sundaystori.es as the Return-Path.

If you need any help or have questions, just reply to this email.

Thanks,
Postmark Team
